Description: Egypt [?], portrait of small group of adult males and children [Beja?]. Wearing gowns, one male wearing turban, carrying walking-stick. Shelter made of poles, mats behind males. Desert setting. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Geography: Bishareem not identified in sources - possibly district named above. Ethnic group suggested by T Cotterill, 15/01/1997. Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
